Phrase.Text: Greetings [YourLeaderName]. The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] hope to have a lot of contact with your species.
The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] mission is simple: Take Out The Iconians. What is the [YourEmpireName] mission, [YourLeaderName]?
It's no secret that the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] is at war with the Iconians. What may surprise you however, [YourLeaderName], is that by helping them defend themselves you doom your own existance.
I fear that the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] are vastly out-numbered in this quadrant. We could really use the aid of the [YourEmpireName].
This war is taking its toll on the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]. Any help the [YourEmpireName] can provide would be greatly appreciated.
The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] have held our own thus far, no thanks to the [YourEmpireName].
You remind me a lot of myself [YourLeaderName]. If I was much weaker and less intelligent.
The Iconians will all die, and if you aid them in any way [YourLeaderName], the [YourEmpireName] will meet the same fate.
Know this [YourLeaderName], helping the Iconians is equal to slapping the entire [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] in the face. Now tell me, what are your plans?
The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] look to expand our galactic borders peacefully.
The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] look to expand our galactic borders peacefully. We mean the [YourEmpireName] no harm.
The [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME] look to expand our galactic borders. We will use force if necessary.
